article.title: On the Gopakumar-Ooguri-Vafa correspondence for Clifford-Klein 3-manifolds

multiple_choice_question.text: What does the normalisation factor in the simplest example of a Gaussian measure with  dµn(x) = du(0) look like?
choices: NN
[Volg(U(N))]-1
NN / [Volg(U(N))]
NN  * [Volg(U(N))]

multiple_choice_question.text: The coefficients of N^(2-2g) in the genus expansion of ln(Z_N(t)) for the gauged Gaussian matrix model have a particular geometric significance. What do they represent for g > 1?
choices: The Euler characteristic of the moduli space of genus g curves with one marked point.
The symplectic volume of the moduli space of genus g curves with one marked point.
The Euler characteristic of the moduli space of genus g curves with no marked points.
The symplectic volume of the moduli space of genus g curves with no marked points.

multiple_choice_question.text: What is the expression for the Chern-Simons functional, CS[A], of a smooth U(N) gauge connection A on a smooth, closed, oriented real 3-manifold M?
choices: ∫_M Tr(A ∧ dA)
∫_M Tr(A ∧ A ∧ A)

multiple_choice_question.text: How can a special linear matrix A be decomposed into radial and polar parts, given T*S³ ~ R³ × S³ ~ SL(2, C)?
choices: A = UH, where U ∈ SU(2) and H ∈ H(2, C)
A = HU, where U ∈ SU(2) and H ∈ H(2, C)
A = Ue^H, where U ∈ SU(2) and H ∈ H_o(2, C)
A = e^HU, where U ∈ SU(2) and H ∈ H_o(2, C)

multiple_choice_question.text: What is the formula for the genus-g primary Gromov-Witten potential of X, denoted as GW_g(t)?
choices: Σ_(d>0) e^(td) / [M_g,0(X, d)]_vir
Σ_(d≥0) e^(td) / [M_g,0(X, d)]_vir
Σ_(d>0) e^(td) [M_g,0(X, d)]_vir
Σ_(d≥0) e^(td) [M_g,0(X, d)]_vir

multiple_choice_question.text: In the context of the resolved conifold, what does the superimposed "pq-web diagram" on the right side of Figure 2 represent?
choices: The structure of the singular fiber at μ=0
The location of Lagrangian A-branes used in open Gromov-Witten calculations
The toric data of the singular conifold before resolution
The intersection points of the toric divisors

multiple_choice_question.text: In the context of Chern-Simons theory on Clifford-Klein 3-manifolds, what does V_Γ,N represent?
choices: The set of all flat connections on M.
The set of gauge-inequivalent flat connections with rank N.
The moduli space of flat connections on M.
The set of gauge-equivalent flat connections with rank N.

multiple_choice_question.text: What does the polynomial equation p(x; u_i + d_i,k(y + u_0 y^(-1))) = 0 define in the context of the B-model for Clifford-Klein 3-manifolds?
choices: The mirror curve of the resolved conifold.
The A-model partition function.
The spectral curve for the B-model.
The Chern-Simons partition function.
